title: JRPG Chronicles: Golden Age Music Pack
longDescription:
🎮 Emotional Fantasy Leitmotifs & Atmospheric Ambiences in 90s/PS1 Style. Inspired by eternal classics, and the works of Yasunori Mitsuda (Chrono Trigger/Cross, Xenogears), and Nobuo Uematsu (Chrono Trigger, Final Fantasy 1-9). This is a passion project I've dedicated many months to, aiming to recreate the nostalgic feelings of the great games from the 90s era. I genuinely hope you'll enjoy it!


Watch Sampler Preview



🎶 Tracklist


⚔️ Battle

♪ Battle Theme [1:08] - don't overdo with encounter rate (!)

♪ Boss Fight [1:28] - the tough one

♪ Boss Theme Light [1:06] - for events preceding the boss battle (melancholy)

♪ Boss Theme Dark [1:06] - for events preceding the boss battle (gloom)

♪ Pre-Battle (loop & one-shot) - for events before the ordinary battle theme

♪ Victory (loop & transition & full) - congrats, you won

♪ Defeat (loop & one-shot) - don't lose determination


⏳ Events

♪ Time Has Come [1:26] - for solemn & epic moments, or starting menu

♪ Requiem of Tragedy [1:15] - sorrowful & tragic scenes

♪ Near the Hearth [1:24] - heartwarming events & dialogues

♪ Quirky Events [1:04] - perfect for silly dialogues & quirky characters

♪ Sweet Slumber (one-shot) - for those dozing off

♪ Achieved/Acquired (one-shot) - yay!


🌏 Locations

♪ Map Exploration [1:02] - for global maps

♪ Village Idyllic [1:44] - starting location, where mother wakes you up

♪ Village Troubled [1:00] - you're back, but something is different now

♪ Village Grim [1:18] - it has changed dramatically (or it's another village)

♪ Mysterious Forest [1:16] - forest or any mysterious location

♪ Sea Sanctuary [1:36] - sea location or some enigmatic shrine

♪ Sunny Valley [1:27] - a place to chill and have fun, or another town

♪ Benighted Lands [1:26] - decay is everywhere; don't stay here for long

♪ Dungeon Puzzles [1:36] - underworld location & riddles

♪ Dungeon Ambience [1:48] - it gets eerie; where's the exit

♪ Cozy Shop [1:00] - buy some Aquasol or Tonic
